user_query: I'm organizing a company retreat in Miami and I need to book a hotel with conference facilities and a pool. Can you suggest some hotels in Miami that can accommodate a large group and provide meeting rooms? Also, provide me with the hotel details and guest reviews. Additionally, I would like to know the cancellation probability of a flight from Chicago to Miami on March 20, 2024, operated by American Airlines, flight number AA123.

TaskList.description: Search for hotels in Miami that have conference facilities, a pool, and can accommodate a large group.
Retrieve details for the suggested hotels including amenities, capacity, and pricing.
Gather guest reviews for the identified hotels to evaluate their suitability.
Check the cancellation probability for American Airlines flight AA123 from Chicago to Miami on March 20, 2024.
